mapper.select: SELECT last_insert_rowid() FROM user_permission WHERE rowid = (SELECT last_insert_rowid())

SELECT p.* FROM user_permission p join sys_module_action a on p.action_id = a.action_id and a.module_id=p.module_id join sys_module m on a.module_id = m.module_id and p.module_id = m.module_id join user_role r on r.role_id=p.role_id join sys_user u on u.user_id = r.user_id WHERE u.user_id = #{userId} AND m.module_code = #{moduleCode}
AND a.action_code = #{actionCode}

SELECT distinct p.*, m.module_name, a.action_name FROM user_permission p join sys_module_action a on p.action_id = a.action_id and a.module_id=p.module_id join sys_module m on a.module_id = m.module_id and p.module_id = m.module_id WHERE p.role_id = #{roleId}

WITH RECURSIVE -- 获取用户直接有权限的模块 UserPermittedModules AS ( SELECT DISTINCT m.module_id, m.module_name, m.module_code, m.parent_id, m.sort, m.module_url, m.redirect, m.icon, m.icon_type, m.style FROM user_permission up JOIN sys_module m ON up.module_id = m.module_id JOIN user_role ur ON up.role_id = ur.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} ),
-- 递归获取所有父模块 PermittedWithParents AS ( -- 基础查询：用户直接有权限的模块 SELECT module_id, module_name, module_code, parent_id, sort, module_url, redirect, icon, icon_type, style FROM UserPermittedModules
UNION
-- 递归查询：向上查找父模块 SELECT m.module_id, m.module_name, m.module_code, m.parent_id, m.sort, m.module_url, m.redirect, m.icon, m.icon_type, m.style FROM sys_module m JOIN PermittedWithParents p ON m.module_id = p.parent_id )
-- 最终结果 SELECT DISTINCT module_id, module_name, module_code, parent_id, sort, module_url, redirect, icon, icon_type, style FROM PermittedWithParents ORDER BY parent_id, sort
